## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and user files

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates
*.VC.db
*.VC.VC.opendb

# Auto-generated files
*.cache
*.log
*.pdb
*.mdb

# Web publish files
*.Publish.xml

# SQL Server files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# VS for Mac
.idea/
*.userprefs

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Windows image thumbnails
Thumbs.db

# .NET Core
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Node.js / front-end (if applicable)
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn.lock
package-lock.json

# Others
.vs/
_ReSharper*/
*.ncrunch*
*.localhistory/
*.DS_Store
*.orig

# Optional: ignore test results
TestResults/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml
